name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in cloud-native systems and infrastructure management. Proficient in **AWS** (including **EKS**, **RDS**, **IAM**, **VPC**, **S3**), **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**, ensuring high-performance and secure deployment environments. Experienced in implementing CI/CD pipelines and monitoring solutions using **GitLab**, **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **CloudWatch**. Skilled in disaster recovery and business continuity planning, with a solid understanding of networking and security controls, including private networking and least privilege principles.

As a quick learner and flexible team player, I excel in multitasking and problem-solving, successfully delivering AI/ML-powered applications that support automation and predictive analytics in compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My technical proficiency extends to **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with backend development expertise in **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
